names.name: Bihari
names.meaning: The one who enjoys (referring to his playful nature in Vrindavan).

names.name: Suresh
names.sindhi: سر: ديـوتـا؛ ايـش: اِيـسور= ديـوتـائُـن جو اِيـسور

names.name: Sarvanand
names.sindhi: سمپوُرڻ جِيون کي آنـند ڏِيَـڻ وارو

names.name: Nandan
names.meaning: The joyful one or the son of Nanda.

names.name: Anant
names.sindhi: بي شُمار: اَنت بِـنا، بي اَنت: ڀگوان جنھن جو سڀ تي اڌِيـڪار آھي

names.name: Achyut
names.sindhi: ڀِـرانـتِيءَ ۽ ڀـرم کي دوُر ڪرڻ وارو

names.name: Ghanshyam
names.meaning: The one with a complexion like dark clouds.

names.name: Priyadarshi
names.meaning: The one who is pleasing to behold.

names.name: Sarvaved
names.meaning: The one who is the essence of all knowledge (Vedas).

names.name: Damodar
names.meaning: The one with a rope around his waist.
names.sindhi: دام=ٻـڌڻ، اُدر=پيٽ: ماتـا يـشودا جڏھن ڀـڳوان شرِي ڪرشڻ کي اُکريءَ سان ٻـڌو تـڏھن دامودر نـالـو پـيو.

names.name: Antaryami
names.sindhi: منُشَ جي من، دل و دماغ جي اَنـدر جِي ڄاڻ رکـڻَ وارو يـا جنھن کان ڪُجهُه به لِـڪل نـاھي

names.name: Sanatan
names.sindhi: نِـتِـيه نِـرنـتر: سداسرودا قـائـم و دائـم رھڻ وارو.

names.name: Tribhuvan Nath
names.meaning: The lord of the three worlds.

names.name: Murari
names.meaning: The slayer of the demon Mura.

names.name: Nathiya
names.meaning: The Lord with a nosering (a reference to Krishna's childhood mischief).

names.name: Dayalu
names.sindhi: ديـا: ڪروُڻـا؛ آلـيَه:گهـرُ يـا ڀَـنڊارُ= ديـا ۽ ڪروُڻـا جو ڀَـنڊارُ

names.name: Sarpana
names.meaning: The one who surrenders to all (or causes surrender).

names.name: Purushottam
names.meaning: The supreme being or the best among men.

names.name: Govind
names.meaning: The protector of cows and the senses.

names.name: Ranchod
names.meaning: The one who left the battlefield (as part of a divine strategy).

names.name: Chakradhar
names.meaning: The bearer of the discus (Sudarshan Chakra).

names.name: Pranav
names.meaning: Om, a sacred sound and symbol.

names.name: Paripurna
names.meaning: Perfect and complete expression of divinity.

names.name: Satyanarayan
names.meaning: The Lord who is the ultimate truth.

names.name: Dharmagupta
names.meaning: 'Dharma' means righteousness, 'Gupta' means protector, Dharmagupta Protector of Dharma

names.name: Sudarshan
names.meaning: The power to maintain righteousness and destroy evil forces.

names.name: Nyayakari
names.meaning: One who does or administers justice

names.name: Yugala
names.meaning: Pair or couple, refers to the divine couple Krishna and Radha..
